characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a black car, driver of a blue car, cyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a wet road in a rainy condition. At the beginning, a white sedan is seen on the right side, moving towards the center of the road. By the middle of the segment, a blue car appears on the right side, moving towards the center of the road. Towards the end, a cyclist appears on the right side, moving towards the center of the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while navigating through the wet road. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the cars and cyclist appearing from the right side.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving towards the center of the road. 2) Right side: A blue car, approximately 15 meters away, moving towards the center of the road. 3) Right side: A cyclist, approximately 5 meters away, moving towards the center of the road.

characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a black pickup truck
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a wet road with low visibility due to rain. A white sedan is visible on the right side of the road, and a black pickup truck suddenly appears from the left side, moving into the self-vehicles lane.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while approaching an intersection. The sudden appearance of the black pickup truck from the left side forces the self-driving vehicle to decelerate to avoid a collision.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, stationary. 2) Left side: A black pickup truck, approximately 5 meters away, moving into the self-vehicles lane.
